desc: SHIFT RED DRONE is a portable, compact unprecedented one-hand controlled quadcopter equipped with vision recognition, and various sensors to provide the optimal flight experience to beginners and experts alike. Needless to say, Shift Red's unique controller and autonomous flight mode are outstanding.

layout.text:
SHIFT RED is a portable and compact quadcopter equipped with vision recognition, and various sensors to provide the optimal flight experience to beginners and experts alike.
Needless to say, Shift Red's unique controller and autonomous flight mode are outstanding.
